values:
READ THIS BEFORE ADDING ME


I would like to make some things known, because Im sure at some point these things will come into play


 1. I atleast give everyone sometime to know me alittle better and for me to know them, but if we reach a point where we're just not hitting it off/ clicking or Im just not feeling it-- I will remove you , please remember that its nothing personal!  I simply don't want just a list of names, I want a list of FRIENDS......... I don't think thats too much to ask for 

2.  If I don't add you back right away, its because Im not going to, again its nothing personal, its mostly likely a compatibility issue/nothing in common issue...... nothing more

3. Don't be a dick to the people on my friends list, there are several people Iam fond of .......I would react aggressively should you be rude to any of them

4. Oh and this probably goes with out saying BUT, If you never comment (or very rarely comment) I will assume that you do not read this journal, have very little interest in its contents or you do not  wish to interact with me. A lack of commenting, will result in your removal.  I don't expect comments constantly, but its nice to know every once and awhile that someones on the other end reading your crap.



----------This is what you can expect from me---------

I rarely talk about my life, I post alot of questions to get conversations going , I post alot of stories or memories from long ago, or I post about what's on my mind

I do not post surveys or memes, the surveys I do post on occasion are blank ones that I write , for the people on my friends list to take

I do not leave comments unless I feel the need to , I will not post comments on , for example new hair cut posts

I do not cause drama or pick fights (I only fight the ones that are worth fighting, I leave the petty and ridiculous alone)

I will always repsect your viewpoints as long as you respect mine

I do NOT take myself all that seriously and really, neither should you!



-------- Don't add me if any of these apply to you--------

You are in love with yourself

You constantly make a friends-cut posts in your journal (if you want to cut me, simply do it! I will not beg to stay)

you want bodies instead of actual connections - just adding random people just for the sake of adding them makes you look like a neurotic douchebag

you post 50 million different pictures of yourself from a thousand and one angles, sure I like pictures, but if you CONSTANTLY post pictures of yourself, I will assume you are full of yourself, sorry ....but I call it like I see it

U Talk lyke dys or use netspeak,because half of the time I have no idea what the hell your talking about not only that, but Im an old, I have limited time on this earth and I can't spend it decoding your journal entries

your intentionally rude, I don't mean rude as in you tell the truth and nothing, but the truth so help you god, I mean you go out of your way to be a dick

you expect alot of comments or journal entries

your cool, I don't have time for self important, pompous,trendy arrogant ,spoiled little shitheads so smell my ass or go fornicate yourself.. one or the other... whatever works for me or prehaps you could do both! 

You write alot about your boyfriend or girlfriend(sorry but your journal is suppose to be about you! How can I ever learn anything, if all you do is chatter on about your S.O)

You recount every annoying little detail of your day( sorry, Im not interested in those types of journals- again
how can I LEARN anythning if all you ever post about is waking up and having a bowl of cheerios?)

You write about your many sexual encounters(and before anyone ask, Yes! Im a really big prude, with an even bigger stick wedged up my backside!)

You do not have a good sense of humor 

You're a snob
Friends Only

I've been talking with my mom, and we decided to buy the 8 acres together...then we're going to split the property and i'm going to get 4 acres and my parents are going to have 4. Then we're going to get 2 houses and put on each 4 acres and i'm going to have my own house. I'm SO excited, I can not wait. I'm still going to buy a horse for myself and my nephew. Nothing much has been going on...except work. The guy that emailed me, wanting to get to know me more. He would call me and leave a message, and when I try and call him back I get his voice mail. It's like playing phone tag. Maybe one day we'll get a hold of one another. Besides my job, I got a part time job...and I can not stand the people. I work my ass off...sweating...and all the other workers stand around or sit and talk. I wish I could get paid to do that. But all the jobs i've had...I always "worked hard for the money"! *LOL* Off to make dinner. Have a good night

This was taken today. She turned 9 months yesterday :) She's growing up SO fast! That's not the whole picture! The right side got cut off. I tried to link it, but for some reason it's not working. Sorry if it messes up your page

Happy Easter!! I thought I had found the perfect house I wanted, but I found something much better. Instead of almost 6 acres, I found something with 8 acres. So much better. I'm seriously thinking about getting it. I've always wanted a horse, so if I get the place with 8 acres I will have plenty of property for my babies and have room for a horse. Does anyone have any suggestions for a first time buyer...if you know anything about horses? I've been searching the web and can't find any info on horses. I'm seriously interested in an Appaloosa. I saw a few very beautiful Appaloosas. Are females called geldings? *LOL* I'm not stupid, it's just new to me. Hope you all have a safe, but fun Easter :)

I know I haven't been on here in a while.  I've been busy and i'm usually on myspace.  Does anyone know html very well?  There's a page that I would like mine to look...I mean the format, like the comment box, the info box, etc.  If you know what I mean.  Here's what it looks like...

http://www.myspace.com/jennajameson

Here's my page, and I would like to keep the background and maybe another angel for the info box.  If you would like to add me...feel free

http://www.myspace.com/bonnie_kay

Thank you so much

About an hour or two ago, I was outside with my dogs and it started raining. Not pouring down enough to get soaked, but raining enough that you can enjoy it. I know, a lot of people don't like that rain...but crazy me...I LOVE the rain. I was standing outside in the middle of the yard looking up into the sky with my eyes shut, and the rain falling down on my face and I was thinking how nice it would be at that moment to be walking on the beach bare foot with someone special...holding hands. I absolutely love this weather...

<font face="Tahoma"><font color="pink">The other day I had recieved an email from a man that found me online and he contacted me.  It was such a nice email.  I don't think I have ever recieved such a nice email.  We have so many things in common...he likes to go horseback riding, movies, cooking, the beach, etc.  I emailed him back and this evening I recieved another email from him.  I don't want to get my hopes up, because after quite a few bad blind dates/boyfriends...i'm hesitant.  There were two things in his email that really got to me.  First of all, he asked if I knew of any horses near where I live that "you/we can ride", and he said that he's going to keep his schedule free to meet me.  *LOL* It was really sweet, but i'm trying not to fall for it.  He seems so amazing!  I don't know what to do.

The past couple of weeks my mom and I have been talking, and we decided that we deserve a vacation. She has always wanted to go back to Alaska...where we both were born. So, she decided that we'll go this Summer. We'll drive...including my nephew...to Seattle and take the ferry to Alaska. The last time we were there was a couple years ago. When we get there we're going to stay a couple days in each town. I think it will be so nice. We also decided that this December we're going to go to California Adventure and Marine World...or Sea World, whichever one is down south. I've never been there, but have always wanted to go. Not last year but the year before my mom and I took my nephew to Disneyland in December...which he has never been there, and we had a great time. I can't believe how crazy people get there. My poor nephew almost got trampled on by people that almost walked right into him. Other than that, he loved it and so did we. I loved seeing all the Christmas decorations. I can not wait. I'm getting excited about it every time I think about it.

<font face="Tahoma"><font color="white">For the last couple of hours, i've been trying to find some mp3 for my winamp...and have yet to find any.  I could use some good music to calm me down...and this isn't helping :/  I'm getting more frustrated.  Does anyone know where to find some?  One song in particular, if you've ever seen "Phat Girls"...I would love to find "African Queen".  That's one of the songs in the soundtrack.  Thank you in advance!

This morning my mom came over and I was in the other room and guess who shows up? My so-called brother. Ever since high school I don't consider him my brother. You may think i'm mean or whatever...but no one knows what i've been through. Anyways...my mom went out to make him leave. He is not allowed to come around here or my parents house. My nephew...his son lives with my parents. My mom has been raising him since he was about 1 or 2 yrs old. My brother has been using drugs and drinking ever since high school and when he gets angry he goes out of control. I heard both of them yelling at each other, so I went out and told him to get the "bleep" out of here. I noticed that he was pushing the gate against my mom and yelling at her and when I came out and told him to leave...he said that he's going to kill me. It hasn't been the first time he has ever said that. He has done things to me since high school...nothing surprises me. He finally left, and my mom told me that he hit her knee with the gate, scratched her wrist with the gate, pushing his finger against her glasses (of course while wearing them) and he got right up in her face and told her that he wants Jonathan. My mom told him that he's in school and she had to tell him that 3 or 4 times and he told her that he's going to kill her as well...and here's the dusey...that she's going to jail. I DO NOT know what he's on, but I seriously got pissed. I'm glad he left after I came out, I was about to go kick his ass...and i'm not afraid of him. I've put up with his crap for many years and this has been going on just as long...it seems like. I'm still waiting for him to come back. I'm glad I have 4 dogs, and I wonder if any of them would bite the shit out of him. Hmmm...I wouldn't let them do that. If he ever done anything to one of my babies, I would seriously have to kick his ass!! I'm going to go try and cool down. Besides me being hot after what happened...it's way too hot here

The Part of You That No One Sees
You are passionate, romantic, and emotional. You put love first in your life, even though you have often been disappointed by it. You expect to be swept of your feet, and you never expect infatuation to die out. Underneath it all, you are scared that you aren't lovable. Your insecurity has ruined many relationships, as you are unable to see the love that's really there. You are secretly afraid of being alone. Confronting your insecurities is incredibly painful.
What's the Part of You That No One Sees?
Your Personality Cluster is Introverted Thinking
You are: Objective, honest, and credible Intellectually curious, with many diverse interests More inclined toward ideas than people Fiercely independent and unapologetically unconventional
What's Your Personality Cluster?
What Your Hands Say About You
You are logical, analytical, and rational. You have good verbal skills. Flexible and broad minded, you can fit in to any situation. There's no telling where your life will take you. Consistent and reliable, you like to count on structure and routine in your life. Your emotions tend to be nervous and potent. Your energy - both positive and negative - deeply impacts your life.
What Do Your Hands Say About You?
You Are: 50% Dog, 50% Cat
You are a nice blend of cat and dog. You're playful but not too needy. And you're friendly but careful. And while you have your moody moments, you're too happy to stay upset for long.
Are You More Cat or Dog?
Your Birth Month is November
Tolerant and inspirational, you are wise beyond your years. You are universally sympathetic and a great humanitarian. Your soul reflects: Compassion, friendship, and secret love Your gemstone: Citrine Your flower: Chrysanthemum Your colors: Dark blue, red, and yellow
What Does Your Birth Month Mean?
Your Love Number is 6
Who you fall in love with is all about who you trust. Loyalty is important to you, and you want the most faithful of lovers. In return, you never let your heart or eyes wander. Open and honest, your relationships tend to be free of secrets.
What Is Your Love Number?
You Are a Martini
There's no other way to say it: you're a total lush. You hold your liquor well, and you hold a lot of it!
What Mixed Drink Are You?
You Are a White Flower
A white flower tends to represent purity, simple beauty, and modesty. At times, you are dignified like a magnolia. And at other times, you represent great ecstasy, like a white orchid. And more than you wish, you're a little boastful, like a white hydrangea.
What Color Flower Are You?
Your Eyes Should Be Green
Your eyes reflect: Striking attractiveness and danger What's hidden behind your eyes: A vivid inner world
What Color Should Your Eyes Be?

I just got back from seeing "Ghost Rider". That was a great movie!! Nicholas Cage was amazing in the movie. So far, with all the new movies out...that i've seen so far...Ghost Rider has been the best. I'm starving, haven't eaten all day. Would anyone like to go out and get something to eat? *LOL* I wish. Just kidding :) ~Take Care~

<font face="verdana"><font color="gold">I finally found the perfect house!  It's so beautiful...inside and out.  It has 5.99 acres and I wanted to make sure that it had enough property for my babies to run around all they want.  Where I am now, my dogs can't stay out too long because people and kids would walk by my yard and tease my dogs.  I can't stand people that do that.  It's really getting on my last nerves.  Anyways...hopefully i'll be in my new house in a couple weeks.  

I just got through watching "I love New York".  Has anyone else seen that show?  What do you think?  Now i'm going to go try and get some sleep.  I only had about 3 hours of sleep last night.  

~Take care~

Hello everyone!  I know it's been so long since i've been online.  I was having trouble with my computer.  I have so much to catch up on...reading everyone's entries.  I will catch up ASAP.  I haven't been feeling that good the past few days, but I thought I would drop in to let everyone know I haven't forgotten about anyone.  

Take care!

Today I had to take my Rottweiler puppy...Teddy Bear...to the vet so she can get fixed. She's going to stay there all night and I won't get to see her until after 3PM tomorrow. I don't know what i'm going to do. I've never been away from her for more than 8 hours a day. Sounds crazy, but I consider her as one of my babies. Well, the only good thing that's coming out of this...I will get to sleep through the night until my alarm goes off. Usually she wakes me up at the butt crack of dawn...but not tonight. I'm going to be so happy and excited to see her tomorrow! I can't wait...

In 1975 (the year you were born)
Gerald Ford is president of the US Evacuation of US civilians from Saigon as Communist forces complete takeover of South Vietnam FBI agents capture Patty Hearst, who is indicted and convicted of bank robbery Teamster Jimmy Hoffa disappears without a trace Marines rescue the crew of the American ship the Mayaguez near Vietnam First Lady Betty Ford says in an interview that she thinks her children have tried marijuana Natalie Imbruglia, Drew Barrymore, David Beckham, Enrique Iglesias, Angelina Jolie, and Tiger Woods are born Cincinnati Reds win the World Series Pittsburgh Steelers win Superbowl IX Philadelphia Flyers win the Stanley Cup Production begins on Star Wars Jaws and The Rocky Horror Picture Show are the top grossing films Soul Train premieres on television in the United States "The Way We Were" (performed by Barbara Streisand) wins the Grammy for best song Saturday Night Live and Wheel of Fortune premiere
What Happened the Year You Were Born?

<font color="turquoise">It's freezing outside and it's supposed to rain and there's also going to be snow in the rain.  I'm so excited, but wish I had someone to snuggle up with in bed.  

I'll get some good sleep tonight

Good night and sweetdreams</font color><font color="red">♥</font color>

Taken from
What type of Fae are you?

I met someone that i'm starting to like. We've been chatting for a while and I really enjoy talking with him. He's so nice, funny and sweet. I actually miss him when I don't get to talk with him. I'm off to bed, have an early day. Good night and sweetdreams!

<font color="#ff0000">The last week or so i've been texting someone that I met online and at first he seemed to be really nice and sweet...but things changed.  He was telling me how much he wanted to get to know me and then I wouldn't hear from him for quite a while.  When I ask him a question he gets all angry.  I don't need someone to get pissed at me for no reason.  I told him that I hope he finds what he's looking for, but I don't think things will work out.  He told me that he loved me and that I made him feel good, etc, etc.  I don't know how someone could say they love me and not know anything about me.  I never answered his text messages last night.  Was it wrong of me to say goodbye??  I need some good friends that I can talk to...</font>

Hello!  Long time no hear.  Just thought I would drop in to let everyone know...if anyone really gives a shit...that i'm still alive.  I'm going to take pictures of my puppy within the next couple of days with my phone and try and send it to my computer, and see if I can post them.  I can not believe she's going on 5 months already.  She's a handful and a brat!  She's going on 5 months and already weighs over 30lbs.  A couple people have said she's going to be a horse, and a couple other people said she's going to be huge.  Her mom weighs 95...so we'll see if she'll weigh more than her mom.  She's not fat, and my friend at work says it's all muscle.  

Man is she adorable!!

I haven't been online for quite a while. I've been working like crazy and now that i've had my puppy for the past week...almost 2 weeks this Thursday. I will try my best to update as often as I can and comment on your journals. This last Friday my mom and I went to a casino here to see the Chippendales. All I can say is...OH...MY...GOD!!! Two of them were so damn hot. One of them was asian with long dark hair, and the second one walked around before the show started and was greeting some of the women. He walked up to me and grabbed my hand and kissed it. I wanted to faint! I will post pictures of them as soon as I can, and I will post a picture of my puppy. She looks like a tiny teddy bear :) I'm almost off work...so it's time to say good night! Good Night ♥

A few minutes ago this lady came up and was asking questions and before she left she asked if I was "family". While she was asking me she held her hand out to shake mine, and of course I shook her hand to be nice. But while she finished her question she just stook there holding my hand. I felt so uncomfortable and embarrassed! My co-worker this evening got a kick out of it and this really nice lady that comes in all the time also thought it was funny and maybe a little crazy. I told my co-worker that I would be really flattered if it was a man that told me I was cute! Yes, the lady told me to my face that I was cute. I was not flattered one bit. Don't get me wrong...I don't have anything against gay people. I just love men

Today is going pretty fast. I can't wait until 2:00 P.M. ;) But i'm also tired of working with people that can't do anything, and I have to do it all myself. Hope everyone is having a better day. 

Oh...I have decided that i'm not going to read or comment on everyone's journal. I will only read and comment on those who give me the same courtesy.  Thank you everyone who has been keeping in touch and I will do the same when I get a chance.  I'm currently at work...which i'm not supposed to be on here *LOL*

*hugs*

Tuesday and Wednesday of last week were terrible. I really don't like working with people that are in bad moods...then that makes me get in a bad mood. Sara...my pregnant co-worker, she was in a bitchy mood those two days and this morning she was in a bad mood. I hate working with people that way, so every chance I got I tried to change her mood. I don't know if it was because our boss got to work this afternoon or what...but she eventually started talking to me again. For some reason she quit talking to me and I didn't do anything to her. A couple of people at work said it could be because of her hormones...who knows? There's a guy at work that has been kind of smiling at me. The last couple of weeks it has been reminding me of Patrick. I'm being kind of hesitant...but on the other hand I don't want to be. But i'm afraid that it will turn out just like it did with Patrick. He is so handsome...nevermind *LOL* Last night my mom and I went to work and he was there. We were walking around and my mom had told me that he sure was eye balling me. Today every chance I got I would glance his way and I would catch him looking my way. I'm not sure if he was, because I don't want to make it so obvious that i'm staring at him...but it looked like he was looking my way every time he walked by where I was. I've also noticed that he also acts kind of shy. I don't know if it's a sun burn...but he looked like he was blushing a couple of times. *sigh* I don't know...only time and patience will tell *crosses fingers*

So yesterday was my Friday and the day went by faster than I thought it would. Most of the time I was listening to my co-worker talk about her boyfriend and their problems. They knew each other about 5 years before they started dating and she went on to tell me that the ex-girlfriend that was dating her boyfriend is still in love with him. Leslie...my co-worker...she told me that she knows so many people in this town and in December last year someone emailed her the ex-girlfriend's phone number. Leslie recently found it and decided to call her when she thought it was the right time. I'm standing there listening to all this and trying to figure out if i'm a therapist?? I don't mind listening and trying to help other's with their problems...but when I have problems or things I want to talk about...do you think anyone is there for me?? NO!! Recently a friend of Leslie's told her that they saw her boyfriend near where he works with his ex. They also said they saw her boyfriend somewhere else in town with his ex. Leslie decided to call his ex and tell her that they are now living together and before she can finish what she was saying, his ex hung up on her. Leslie decided to call her boyfriend and he was telling her that he never done anything...that they are just friends. He asked her if it was alright that they are friends. Leslie said no...you can't be friends with someone that you used to sleep with. Most of the day she was on the phone calling her boyfriend and leaving him messages...giving him ultimatums. He wouldn't answer the phone until an hour and a half when she would be off work. But she felt better when she got off work. It could be from me listening to her and giving her my advice...or she felt better after all the calling his ex and calling him telling him off. What do you think? Do you agree that you can't be friends with someone you used to sleep with? After listening to her I was thinking how much I miss talking with certain people. Made me think about a lot of things *sigh*

The past couple of weeks i've had so many thoughts run through my head...wish I had time to jot them down. I've been really busy with work and it's been hard to work with my new tattoo...actually it was hard to work. I couldn't put my left arm down next to my side without it throbbing with so much pain...it was almost impossible to handle. It hurt to lift anything, but unfortunately I had to since no one I work with actually wants to work. I get so irritated when I actually do more work than my manager...now that's pathetic!! This girl I work with...Sara...she's about 4 months pregnant. It's actually nice to work with her so I can hear about what's going on with her baby...with all the kicking and moving and changing positions from from head being up and yesterday she told me that the baby must have done a complete circle because now the baby's head is aimed down. She has told me a few times that it feels like there's an alien inside her. Sometimes when i'm listening to her describe what's going on, I can't help but get a little jealous. She's about 22 and i'm 30. I don't understand why I haven't found Mr. Right and all my friend's and now a co-worker has babies. I'm not a dog! I get looked at a lot...I get smiled at and I smile back. Maybe my time hasn't come yet. My mom has told me that I should just be patient and it will happen. I just don't want to be too old before I have a baby. Every day when I hear about Sara's baby I get more and more anxious. My time will come...eventually! *crosses fingers* I'm off to bed...so I can snuggle under my blankets and listen to the rain outside my window. That will be close as I will get to heaven...at the moment. I just love it! Good Night and Sweetdreams! Take care ♥

You are 7% evil



You are not evil. Why are you taking this test? You are a nice person and are always thinking about others.

Take this quiz at QuizGalaxy.com
Taken from

I've decided that i'm going to get another tattoo.  I already thought about it when I got my last one done...so yesterday I made an appointment to get another one.  I'm really excited!  I think it's going to be beautiful.  I'm getting it done this coming Friday the 12.  I'm at at work...as usual and I was getting very bored.  I don't have that much long here.  I need to go home and go to bed!  Hope everyone is doing good.  Have a good night! <font color="red">♥</font>

I had a very nice conversation with a great friend. You know who you are. Actually we had our conversation hours ago, but i'm still unable to fall asleep. So I decided to watch the Montel show I recorded while I was at work. Sylvia Browne...who is a psychic. I think she's great and my mom also loves her. Anyways...I was watching the show and a lot of people were talking about their relatives that have passed aways. I don't know why but I started getting upset and for some reason I started thinking about the day when I will pass away. I got scared and started crying, and then I thought about my grandparents that have passed away a few years ago. The last few days I have thought about how much I miss them and wish they were here. I'm actually afraid of dieing. I hope that i'll have kids before the time comes. I just wanted to get that off my chest before I try and go to sleep. I'm still actually a little upset. I don't have much to say...but there's not much to do before heading off to bed. I'm extremely bored...no one to talk to. Or should I say can't find someone to have an actual conversation with. Where do you all find nice people to talk with? Maybe i'm looking in the wrong places. The past week or so it's been raining and I absolutely love it! When i'm outside walking my dogs I just love to stand there with my face up in the air, having the rain fall on my face. I also love opening the door and stepping out onto the porch while it's raining and having the fresh air hitting my face. I have to say that's the best smell i've ever smelled. Some people think i'm crazy that I love rain so much. I don't know why...it's something that i've loved for as long as I can remember. Anyways...if there's anything that any of you would like to know about me. Feel free to ask. I've been reading everyone's journal, and it would be nice for us all to get to know one another better. I hope all of you are. I've been thinking about changing my background picture...again. Can't decide what it should be. Does anyone have a good idea? Would love to hear the different thoughts. Well, i'm off to bed to read a book. Maybe that will help me fall asleep. Hope everyone is doing good. Take care :) Good Night and Sweetdreams♥
